Header.title: Introduction to Data Science
Header.paragraph: Enhance your skills in Data Science to grow yourself, be knowledgeable and efficient enough to get recognised in any industry.

About.paragraph: Learn from industry professionals having more than 15 years of industry experience.
About.paragraph1: Learn in a hybrid model-live-interactive and experiential learning .
About.paragraph2: Gain hands-on experience from day 1 by working on some amazing capstone projects.
About.paragraph3: Small batches to focus on personalized learning.
About.paragraph4: Get a certificate after completion of the course.

Testimonials.text: I feel very happy that I completed my Data Science course from here. Today I have a lot of knowledge in Data Analysis, Machine Learning and Visualization with Python.
Testimonials.name: Akanksha Avinash

Testimonials.text: I am really glad that I decided to go out of my comfort zone. Today I am very conversant with the Scikit-learn Machine Learning framework after completing the Data Science course.
Testimonials.name: Hasmit Singla

Testimonials.text: Provided a pragmatic approach to Machine Learning projects. It is the best course for Data Scientist aspirants. The interesting and industry-relevant projects and the challenges will help the aspirants to gain a lot of knowledge.
Testimonials.name: Meena BM

Testimonials.text: The course is very comprehensive, I learnt about the basics to know in Flux, Redux, Thunk, etc, including Java ( as part of backend programming) AND Microservices. I would like to recommend this course to all.
Testimonials.name: Rupali Bhatta
